description: Erection of part two storey/part single storey rear, first floor side extension, erection of roof extension, installation of 2no. front, 1 no. rear and 1no. side roof lights to facilitate loft conversion and single storey detached outbuilding to rear garden for incidental use of the main dwelling
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows or rooflights at the first floor level  or above in the eastern side elevation shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development must be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Fire Safety Statement submitted on 14 December 2022 unless otherwise approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To ensure that the development incorporates the necessary fire safety measures in accordance with the Mayor's London Plan Policy D12.
